seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Sports Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: How does your sports equipment store compare? See pagespeed score benchmarks from 20 Shopify sports stores. Median: 47, Top 10%: 71.

key_findings: The average Sports store scores 47 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 71+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 44 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Sports Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 20 Shopify stores in the sports equipment industry, measuring pagespeed score.
